title: Why I don't like using Intel.
body:
Intel manipulates results with their compiler, and has been caught red handed forcing non Intel CPUs to run legacy code to effectively slow down other CPUs. 
http://www.ftc.gov/news-events/press-releases/2009/12/ftc-challenges-intels-dominance-worldwide-microprocessor-markets
http://www.pcworld.com/article/2842647/intel-will-pay-you-15-to-settle-claims-it-fudged-pentium-4-benchmarks.html
